metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20725 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in graph_templates.php in Cacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintended characters in the Graph Vertical Label.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
